attributes.action: STOP Islamophobia STOP Insulting Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
attributes.additional_details:
We Muslims believe and love our prophet Muhammad (PBUH) more then anything in the world! Anything means "ANYTHING"
IF it is continuing as it is now happening, specially in the Europe and west; I am afraid we are creating an extremely peace less world.
Please do something now 🙏
attributes.background: I want parliament to have a comprehensive debate on this topic and pass an effective law to stop using abusive languages, cartoons, pictures, and political vendetta.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to discriminate or incite hatred on the grounds of religion. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as imposing tougher penalties for breaches of the law.
